section.title: EarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GenericGameObjects.Notifier Class Reference

para.para: A notifier is a virtual game support object whose purpose is to notify its changing list of subscribers to a change in game state. It is mostly used to notify view components to state changes but can be used for other uses. It does not specify any action that must be taken.

listitem.para: Create a notifier that has no subscribers.
Adds a subscribe to the list of subscribers to notify.
Removes a subscriber from the list of subscribers to notify.
Notifies all subscribers that an update or event has occured.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: A notifier is a virtual game support object whose purpose is to notify its changing list of subscribers to a change in game state. It is mostly used to notify view components to state changes but can be used for other uses. It does not specify any action that must be taken.
